title: Read, Eat and Enjoy!
content:
Must Cook: [Smoke Herring and Broccoli Parmentier](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420032446/http:/chocolateandzucchini.com/)  
_Apologies, you must scroll down the page to find it._  
+++  
Must Learn: [whitespace teaches us how to CSS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420032446/http:/9rules.com/whitespace/design/learning_css.php)  
_Yes, I know CSS is not a verb, but neither is Google._  
+++  
Must Play: [Colour Lovers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420032446/http:/colourlovers.com/)  
_I'm addicted to type, but colo(u)r runs a close second. It is nice to see others have this problem._  
+++  
Must See: [.minh's photostream on flickr](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420032446/http:/flickr.com/photos/solotravels/sets/162061/)  
_Absolutely gorgeous images of an Italy that I want to know._
author: Miss Tiffany
